mapper.insert: insert into generalmeeting (assemblyman_id, update_tag, meeting_id, meeting_order, meeting_dttm, attend_status) values(#{assemblyman_id}, #{update_tag}, #{meeting_id}, #{meeting_order}, #{meeting_dttm}, #{attend_status})
mapper.update: update generalmeeting set update_tag=#{update_tag}, meeting_id=#{meeting_id}, meeting_order=#{meeting_order}, meeting_dttm=#{meeting_dttm}, attend_status=#{attend_status} where assemblyman_id=#{assemblyman_id}
